drupalNodeEvent.title: China Now Music Festival: China and Beethoven, "Beethoven Made in China"

field_organizers.processed: US-China Music Institute of the Bard College Conservatory of Music

field_description.processed: Experience an exciting and imaginative evening of musical interpretations of Beethoven with Chinese accents, presented by world-renowned artists including bass-baritone Shenyang, pipa virtuoso Wu Man, composers Tan Dun and Yu Jingjun, the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, The Orchestra Now, and musicians of the prestigious Central Conservatory of Music. Hosted by Shenyang and Jindong Cai.
